title: When does Season 7 start
body: So just wondering if anyone knows (i've looked couldn't find anything) what time season 7 starts. I've seen December 7, but what time of day will this occur?

replies.body: I haven't seen a specific time announced, but keep an eye on the [**News Page**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) for the official announcement, friend!
